install.name: gk_coolfoto
install.author: Robert Gavick - GavickPro
install.description:
Coolfoto

Can you see the world through our eyes here at GavickPro?

As I pressed the button, time stood still. For a moment everything seemed to be in perfect rhythm. The image catches my attention, it’s eyes spoke every language at the same time, the world felt to move in the palm of my hand, giving me the most wonderful and unexplainable feelings of life.

Everything makes sense with the power of imagery.

It's our vision here at GavickPro, and we’re sharing it with you!

GavickPro Studio is proud to present our newest Joomla 1.5 template design: Coolfoto Template. Its intended use is for either professional or personal photo presentation, and it’s been developed with the highest quality of design and functionality.

Make powerful use of Joomla combined with Coolfoto to highlight your work and put on an awing display for your site’s visitors.

An overview of key features of this template is as follow:
  • Tableless design and 100% css based.
  • 2 style themes: Flowers and Heaven
  • Build support for the new PhotoSlide GK3 component and exclusive Gk Image Show module style with new features.
  • Build support for TabsManager GK3 component for tabs content display.
  • Build support for the News Show Pro GK1 module.
  • WYSIWYG Friendly Typography plugin
  • Disable option for main body appearance on front page.
  • Option of module as component by setting on main body position.
  • Configurable Column and Inset position width.
  • Configurable Header 1/Header 2 and Header 3/Header 4 positions width.
  • Option of Column position to left or right display.
  • Login and Register buttons options for front page and with modalbox effect display.
  • Style Theme Switcher option.
  • Social Toolbar - easy Social Icons display configuration on template parameters.
  • Easy footer content configuration on template parameters.
  • Compressed engine option for each modules.
  • Support for language translation.
  • 3 layout options: 3 columns (component + inset + right/left), 2 columns (component + inset or right/left) and 1 column (component).
  • All 22 modules are fully collapsible and more 20 modules positions ready for tabs.
  • Impressive built-in content style.
  • Gavick Suckerfish menu version, with 2 built-in options - Suckerfish menu and Mootools. 34 different styles moomenu animation effects..
  • Speed menu animation option
  • Optional IE6 Warning / Upgrade Notification
  • Lightweight, modern and very fast-loading design
  • Joomla 1.5 Native
  • W3C XHTML 1.0 Transitional. W3C CSS Valid
  • Fully compatible IE7+, Firefox 2+, Firefox 3, Flock 0.7+, Netscape, Safari, Opera 9.5, Chrome.
  • Delivered with source Adobe .PSD files.
  • Delivered with "QuickStart Package".
View Coolfoto in live demo
